Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured Nikolaivka, Pokrovsk...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukrainian Commander-In-Chief, Oleksandr Syrskyi, has transferred the 128th Brigade from Volchans'k (Kharkov direction) to the Pokrovsk sector. Russian forces have captured 37 sqkm of area in the Pokrovsk direction in less than 48 hours. 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured Nikolaivka, Pokrovsk direction – Ukrainian sources have now confirmed, Russia claimed control 12 hours ago.Russian forces also advanced along the Progres railway, trying to break into Novogrodovka. Ukrainian sources confirm the heavy attacks overnight and alleged Russia took heavy losses failing to break through the massive trench system surrounding the entrance to the town.Further east, Russian forces advanced 2,000 meters south of Novoselovskoye-Persha, east of Mezhovoe.
